login.title: Admin Login
login.fill_in_both_username_and_password: Please fill in both username and password

steps.title: Take a photo of the mushroom
steps.description: Make sure the photo is clear and shows the whole mushroom.

steps.title: Include surroundings
steps.description: Take another photo of the environment where the mushroom was found.

steps.title: Multiple angles
steps.description: Photograph the mushroom from above and from the side if possible.
